item.title: Walmart is selling a $780 memory-foam mattress for just $395 ahead of Black Friday
item.description: Save a whopping $385 on an incredible queen-sized mattress this holiday.

item.title: Amazon is selling a quilted winter coat for $55 ahead of Black Friday
item.description: One shopper said it "exceeded" their expectations.

item.title: Amazon is selling a 10-piece Pyrex food container set for $30 ahead of Black Friday
item.description: Shoppers say the set actually keeps food and leftovers fresh.

item.title: Walmart's bestselling 3-drawer entryway table with a power station is now $55, and it's ideal for small spaces
item.description: "It's perfect in my foyer, and actually looks nicer than in the photo."

item.title: Macy's is selling a luxury Seiko watch for $199 before the Black Friday rush
item.description: "Love the look and feel of this watch."
